home.how.step1.text: Sign up for free in minutes. Tell us about your farm and what you produce or need.

news.page.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest news, policies, and developments in Ethiopian agriculture
news.article1.title: Government Announces New Agricultural Subsidies for 2024
news.article1.desc: The Ethiopian government has announced a comprehensive subsidy program to support smallholder farmers with seeds, fertilizers, and equipment.
news.article1.author: Ministry of Agriculture
news.article2.title: Coffee Prices Reach Record High in International Markets
news.article2.desc: Ethiopian coffee exports are benefiting from rising global prices, with Sidama and Yirgacheffe varieties leading the surge.
news.article2.author: Ethiopian Coffee Association
news.article3.title: New Drought-Resistant Teff Variety Shows Promise in Trials
news.article3.desc: Researchers at the Ethiopian Institute of Agricultural Research have developed a new teff strain that requires 30% less water.
news.article3.author: EIAR
news.article4.title: Mobile App Connects Farmers Directly to Weather Alerts
news.article4.desc: A new mobile application is providing real-time weather forecasts and pest alerts to over 50,000 farmers in the Oromia region.
news.article4.author: AgriTech Today
news.article5.title: Above-Average Rainfall Expected for Upcoming 'Belg' Season
news.article5.desc: The National Meteorology Agency predicts favorable conditions for the short rainy season, boosting prospects for maize and sorghum crops.
news.article5.author: NMA
